K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:454b-14: gtam sna tshogs bstan na des de yang dang yang du 'chi ba las thar par byas par mi 'gyur zhing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:454b-15: shin tu bde ba mya ngan las 'das pa la rab tu bzhag par mi 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:454b-16: bstan pa 'di bshad pa na dge slong lnga brgya len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:455a-1: po ni theg pa thams cad kyis rnam par grol te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:455a-3: kho bo ni nyan thos kyi theg pas rnam par grol ba yang yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:455a-4: kho bo ni rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pas rnam par grol ba'ang yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:455a-6: kho bo ni theg pa chen pos rnam par grol ba'ang yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:455a-8: 'jam dpal khyod ci nyan thos sam /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:455a-10: 'on te yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yin /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:455a-13: kho bo ni nyan thos yin te /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:455a-15: kho bo ni rang sangs rgyas yin te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:455a-17: mi 'jigs pa dang bral ba ni ma yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:455a-18: kho bo ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yin te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:455a-19: bya ba'i rgyun bcad pa ni ma yin no; ;smras pa /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:455a-22: chos ma thos pa mnyan pa sems can thams cad thos par byed de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:455a-23: des na kho bo ni nyan thos yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:455a-25: 'jam dpal khyod ji ltar rang sangs rgyas yin /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:455a-28: des na kho bo rang sangs rgyas yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:455a-30: 'jam dpal khyod ji ltar na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yin /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:455a-32: kho bos chos thams cad chos kyi dbyings su mnyam pa nyid kyis mnyam par khong du chud de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:455b-0: des na kho bo yang dag par @455b rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:455b-2: 'jam dpal khyod nyan thos kyi sa'am /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:455b-4: 'on te yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sa'am /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:455b-5: sa gang la nges pa yin par gzung bar bya /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:455b-8: kho bo ni sa thams cad la nges pa yin par gzung zhig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:455b-10: 'jam dpal khyod so so'i skye bo'i sa la yang nges par gzung bar bya'am /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:455b-16: chos thams cad ni yang dag pa nyid du nges par nges pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:455b-17: nges pa der sems can thams cad kyang nges pa ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:455b-18: kho bo yang nges par der nges pa nyid do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:455b-19: des na kho bo so so'i skye bo sa la yang nges par gzung bar bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:455b-22: gal te chos thams cad yang dag pa nyid du nges par nges pa yin nam /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:455b-23: 'di ni so so'i skye bo'i sa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:455b-25: 'di ni rang sangs rgyas kyi sa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:455b-26: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i sa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:455b-28: zhes sa rnam par bzhag pa gdags par ga la 'gyur /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:455b-33: phyogs bcu'i nam mkha' la 'di ni shar phyogs kyi nam mkha'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:456a-1: steng gi phyogs kyi nam mkha'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:456a-2: zhes brjod kyang phyogs cha la tha dad pa yod kyi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:456a-3: nam mkha' la ni tha dad pa med do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:456a-5: de bzhin du chos thams cad yang dag pa nyid du nges par nges pa la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:456a-6: de bzhin gshegs pa la thabs mkhas pas 'di ni so so'i skye bo'i sa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:456a-8: 'di ni rang sangs rgyas kyi sa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:456a-9: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i sa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:456a-12: sa rnam par bzhag pa la tha dad pa yod kyi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:456a-13: yang dag pa nyid du nges pa la ni tha dad pa med do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:456a-15: 'jam dpal khyod yang dag pa nyid du nges pa la zhugs sam /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:456a-21: ji ltar na khyod zhugs pa yang yin la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:456a-22: byung ba yang yin; smras pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:456a-24: 'di la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi thabs dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:456a-26: ye shes blta bar bya ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:456a-28: 'di ni skyes bu mkhas pa kha cig bshad pa'i don dpes shes par 'gyur ba yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:456a-29: de'i phyir khyod la dpe bstan par bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:456a-33: 'phong gi slob dpon chen po zhig la sdug pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:456a-35: blta na sdug pa'i bu gcig pa zhig kyang yod /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:456a-36: de la mi sdug pa yid du mi 'ong ba phyir rgol ba zhig kyang yod pa las /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:456b-0: des bu gcig pa de thag ring po lam gol ba'i phyogs shig na 'dug @456b pa mthong nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:456b-1: de 'di snyam du de ni bdag la phyir rgol ba yin no snyam du sems skyes te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:456b-2: des de gsad pa'i phyir mda' 'phangs nas 'phangs ma thag tu bu gcig pa yin pa'i 'du shes skyes te; de sngon goms par byas pas shin tu brgyugs te mda' de bu gcig pa'i lus la ma phog pa nyid du lag gis 'dzin pa 'di ni don rnam par shes par bya ba'i phyir dper byas pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:456b-3: 'di la don du lta ba gang zhe na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:456b-5: 'phong gi slob dpon zhes bya ba de ni byang chub sems dpa'i tshig bla dvags so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:456b-7: bu gcig pa zhes bya ba ni sems can thams cad la byang chub sems dpa' bu gcig pa'i 'du shes nye bar 'jog pa yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:456b-8: gsod pa phyir rgol ba zhes bya ba 'di ni nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi tshig bla dvags so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:456b-10: mda' zhes bya ba 'di ni 'phags pa'i shes rab kyi dbang po'i tshig bla dvags so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:456b-14: 'phong gi slob dpon gyis mda' 'phangs la bu gcig pa'i lus la ma phog par shin tu brgyugs te 'dzin pa de bzhin du /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:456b-16: byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i stobs bskyed pas 'du byed thams cad skye ba med par so sor rtog go /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:457a-0: yang dag pa nyid du nges pa la rnam par bltas nas snying rje chen po dang thabs la mkhas pa'i stobs bskyed pas yang dag pa'i @457a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:457a-1: mtha' mngon sum du byed kyang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:457a-2: nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la mi gnas kyi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:457a-3: byang chub sems dpa'i sa la gnas so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:457a-4: sangs rgyas kyi sa la yang 'jud de //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:457a-7: 'di byang chub sems dpa' gang dag gi yul yin /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:457a-10: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' gang dag 'jig rten na yang spyod la /'jig rten gyi chos rnams kyis kyang mi gos shing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:457a-11: 'jig rten na yang snang la chos thams cad la snang ba med pas rab tu phye ba'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi yul lo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:457a-13: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' gang dag sa thams cad la yang snang la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:457a-14: sa ngan pa la yang mi gnas pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:457a-16: byang chub sems dpa' gang dag sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa spang pa'i phyir yang brtson la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:457a-17: chos kyi dbyings zad par ni yang dag par rjes su mi lta ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:457a-19: byang chub sems dpa' gang dag 'dus byas las kyang bskyod la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:457a-20: 'dus ma byas kyang yang dag par ma rnyed pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:457a-22: byang chub sems dpa' gang dag 'khor ba la skyed mos tshal dang gzhal med khang du yang 'du shes la; mya ngan las 'das pa yang don du mi gnyer zhing bsam pa yongs su ma rdzogs pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:457a-24: byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bdag med pa'i bzod pa yang thob la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:457b-0: @457b sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir yang brtson pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:457b-2: byang chub sems dpa' gang dag chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin nam mkha'i rang bzhin du yang shes la; sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba la yang brtson pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:457b-4: byang chub sems dpa' gang dag sangs rgyas thams cad chos kyi dbyings dang mtshungs par yang mthong la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:457b-5: sangs rgyas kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi rgyan gyi phyir brtson 'grus kyang mi gtong ba'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi yul lo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:457b-8: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa 'di ni 'jig rten thams cad dang mi mthun pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:457b-11: 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams 'jig rten gyi chos yongs su shes pa dang ldan yang 'jig rten gyi chos las yang dag par 'da' ba'i phyir sems can rnams la chos ston to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:457b-13: 'jam dpal khyod 'jig rten gyi chos las yang dag par 'da' ba la brtsams te spobs par gyis shig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:457b-14: ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams 'jig rten gyi chos las yang dag par 'da'/
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:457b-17: 'jig rten zhes bya ba ni phung po lnga'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:457b-23: rnam par shes pa'i phung po'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:457b-24: de la gzugs ni dbu ba rdos pa lta bu'o /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:458a-0: @458a *// tshor ba ni chu'i chu bur lta bu'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:458a-1: 'du shes ni smig rgyu lta bu'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:458a-2: 'du byed thams cad ni chu shing lta bu'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:458a-3: rnam par shes pa ni sgyu ma lta bu'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:458a-4: dbu ba dang; chu'i chu bur dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:458a-7: sgyu ma gang yin pa de la 'jig rten yang med /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:458a-8: 'jig rten du gdags pa yang med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:458a-10: phung por gdags pa yang med par gang phung po'i rang bzhin la de ltar mos pa de ni yang dag par bzhugs pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:458a-11: gang yang dag par zhugs pa de 'jig rten gyi chos rnams dang ma 'dres pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:458a-12: gang 'jig rten gyi chos rnams dang ma 'dres pa de 'jig rten gyi chos rnams las yang dag par 'da'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:458a-14: gzhan yang phung po lnga ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:458a-15: gang rang bzhin gyis stong pa de la gnyis su med do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:458a-16: gang gnyis su med pa de la ngar 'dzin pa med /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:458a-18: gang la ngar 'dzin pa med pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:458a-19: nga yir 'dzin pa med pa de la chags pa med de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:458a-20: chags pa med pa rnyed pa de ni 'jig rten las yang dag par 'da' 'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:458a-22: gzhan yang phung po lnga ni rkyen la rag lus pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:458a-23: gang dag rkyen la rag lus pa de dag rag lus pa med pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:458a-24: gang dag rag lus pa med pa de dag bdag po med pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:458a-25: gang bdag po med pa de dag bdag gi ba med pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:458b-0: gang dag bdag gi @458b ba med pa de dag yongs su 'dzin pa med pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:458b-1: gang dag yongs su 'dzin pa med pa de la 'thab pa med pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:458b-2: gang la 'thab pa med pa de la rtsod pa med do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:458b-3: gang la rtsod pa med pa de dag dge sbyong gi chos rtsod pa med pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:458b-4: gang dag dge sbyong gi chos mi rtsod pa de dag nam mkha' la lag pa dang mtshungs te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:458b-5: chos thams cad kyang nam mkha' la lag pa dang mtshungs par shes nas 'jig rten las yang dag par 'da'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:458b-7: gzhan yang phung po lnga ni chos kyi dbyings dang mnyam pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:458b-8: chos kyi dbyings kyang dbyings med pa ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:458b-9: gang khams med pa de la mig gi khams med do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:458b-11: mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams med do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:458b-14: rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams med do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:458b-17: sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams med do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:458b-20: lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams med do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:458b-23: lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams med do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:458b-26: yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams med do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:458b-27: gang khams med pa de la sa'i khams med do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:459a-1: do; ;rnam par shes pa'i khams med do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:459a-4: gzugs med pa'i khams med do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:459a-6: 'dus ma byas kyi khams med do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:459a-7: gang khams med pa de la bdag med /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:459a-14: gang gis de dag rjes su rtogs pa'i tshul gyis mnyam pa nyid du rtogs pa de 'jig rten las yang dag par 'da'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:459a-15: bstan pa 'di bshad pa na 'khor de nas dge slong stong nyis brgya len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:459a-16: de dag sems rnam par grol nas rang rang gi bla gos kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bkab ste; tshig 'di skad du gang dag chos zab mo bstan pa 'di la mos pa med pa'i sems can de dag ni thob pa yang med /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:459a-17: mngon par rtogs pa yang med do zhes 'dzer to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:459a-18: de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis dge slong de dag la 'di skad ces smras so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:459a-19: tshe dang ldan pa dag gis ci zhig thob cing ci zhig mngon par rtogs /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:459a-20: dge slong de dag gis 'di skad ces smras so; ;btsun pa rab 'byor /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:459a-21: dge sbyong ni thob pa med pa mngon par rtogs pa med pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:459a-23: thob pa zhes bya ba de ni g-yo ba nyid do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:459b-0: mngon par rtogs pa zhes bya ba de ni @459b rlom sems nyid do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:459b-1: g-yo ba dang rlom sems gang yin pa de ni bdud kyi las so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:459b-2: lhag pa'i nga rgyal can dag ni bdag gis thob bo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:459b-3: bdag gis mngon par rtogs so zhes 'di lta bu 'di dag gi tshul du rnam par rtogs par 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:459b-5: tshe dang ldan pa de dag gis lhag pa'i nga rgyal can rnams shes sam /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:459b-8: mkhyen pa dang ldan pas mkhyen te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:459b-9: bdag cag ni ji ltar sdug bsngal gyi mtshan nyid mi shes par bdag gis sdug bsngal yongs su shes so zhes smra ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:459b-10: lhag pa'i nga rgyal can du rig par bya zhes kun 'byung ba'i mtshan nyid dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:459b-12: lam gyi mtshan nyid mi shes par bdag gi lam bsgoms so zhes smra ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:459b-13: lhag pa'i nga rgyal can du rig par bya'o snyam mo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:459b-15: sdug bsngal gyi mtshan nyid dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:459b-18: lam gyi mtshan nyid gang yin pa de ni skye ba med pa'i mtshan nyid de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:459b-19: skye ba med pa'i mtshan nyid ni mtshan nyid med pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:459b-20: mtshan nyid med pa ni 'phags pa rnams kyi rnam par grol ba'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:459b-21: chos thams cad kyang rnam par grol ba'i mtshan nyid de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:459b-22: de la ni gang sdug bsngal yongs su shes so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:459b-24: gang 'gog pa mngon du byed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:459b-25: gang lam bsgom mo zhes bya ba gang yang mi dmigs te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:460a-0: chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid 'di thos nas skrag pa @460a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:460a-1: de lhag pa'i nga rgyal can yin par rig par bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:460a-2: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong de dag la legs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:460a-4: gnas brtan rab 'byor la bka' stsal pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:460a-6: dge slong 'di dag gis ji skad bstan pa de de bzhin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:460a-8: dge slong 'di dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa 'od srung gi gsung rab la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa nyid las zab mo'i chos bstan pa 'di lta bu thos te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:460a-9: chos zab mo mnyam pa de nyid kyis rgyus 'di ltar mngon par shes pa myur bar gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:460a-10: zab mo'i chos bstan pa 'di la yang rjes su mthun par gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:460a-13: rnam grangs des ni theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa rnams ma gtogs par gang dag nga'i gsung rab 'di la chos zab mo bstan pa 'di nyan cing thos nas kyang lhag par mos pa de dag thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa byams pa'i gsung rab la 'dus pa gsum gyi grangs su gtogs par rig par bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:460a-14: gang yang theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa de dag ni bzod pa gang yang rung ba 'thob par 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:460a-15: de nas lha'i bu dpal bzang gis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:460a-16: 'jam dpal khyod rgyun du 'dzam bu'i gling na chos ston tam /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:460b-0: dga' @460b ldan gyi gnas su bzhud do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:460b-1: der dga' ldan gyi ris kyi lha rnams la chos bstan du gsol /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:460b-2: de la lha'i bu sngon gyi rgyal ba la lhag par bya ba byas pa dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa dag yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:460b-3: de dag yul phun sum tshogs pas bag med pa'i dbang gis bcom ldan 'das dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:460b-4: khyod la chos nyan du mi 'ong bas na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:460b-5: de dag chos mi nyan pas yongs su nyams par gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:460b-6: de dag khyod las chos thos nas dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po 'phel bar 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:460b-7: de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas de'i tshe gang gis lha'i bu dpal bzang dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:460b-8: thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag dga' ldan gyi gnas su zhugs par bdag nyid kyis shes pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:460b-9: nyams dga' ba'i kun dga'i ra ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:460b-11: nyams dga' ba'i rdzing dang; nyams dga' ba'i skyed mos tshal dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:460b-15: nyi shu pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:460b-19: rta babs dang; skar khung dang ldan pa de dag kyang snang ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:460b-20: lha'i bu mo rkang lag 'jam zhing mnyen pa gser gyi dra ba ltar 'od rnam par dag pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:460b-24: mig padma 'dab ma brgya pa sngon po lta bur mdzes shing dri ma med pa shin tu yangs pa 'dod pa'i sems bskyed pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:460b-25: zla ba tshes pa ltar mngon par dga' ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:461a-2: de dag rgyud gcig pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:461a-17: rtse bas rgyags shing dga' ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:461a-18: rtse ba dang dga' mgur spyong pa dag kyang snang ba de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par bya ba mngon par byas so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:461a-19: de 'dra ba'i byin gyi rlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:461a-20: de nas lha'i bu dpal bzang gis /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:461a-21: rang gi gnas rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa yang mthong /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:461a-22: rang gi g-yog 'khor rnams kyang mthong ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:461a-23: mthong nas kyang ngo mtshar du gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:461a-24: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:461a-26: bdag cag 'di ltar myur du dga' ldan gyi gnas su phyin te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:461a-27: nyams dga' ba'i kun dga' ra ba 'di dag dang zhes bya ba nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:461a-31: bdag gi rang gi gnas 'di dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:461a-32: rang gi g-yog ces bya ba'i bar du sbyar te 'di dag snang ba ngo mtshar to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:461a-33: de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis lha'i bu dpal bzang la 'di skad ces smras so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:461a-34: lha'i bu khyod ni 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor 'di nas gang du yang ma g-yos la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:461a-35: dga' ldan gyi gnas su yang ma phyin te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:461b-0: lha'i @461b bu; 'on kyang thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor 'di dag dga' ldan gyi gnas su zhugs par bdag nyid kyis shes pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:461b-2: kho bo cag kyang dga' ldan gyi gnas su zhugs par bdag nyid kyis shes pa de ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:461b-3: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i rdzu 'phrul rnam par 'phrul ba'i cho 'phrul dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:461b-4: ting nge 'dzin gyi byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:461b-5: de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha'i bu dpal bzang gis 'di skad ces gsol to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:461b-7: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i rdzu 'phrul rnam par 'phrul ba'i stobs dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:461b-8: ting nge 'dzin gyi byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs 'di ni bsam gyis mi khyab ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:461b-9: 'di ltar thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor 'dis phyogs 'di nas gang du yang ma g-yos par 'di snyam du bdag cag dga' ldan gyi gnas su phyin to snyam pa ni ngo mtshar lags so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:461b-10: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:461b-12: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i rdzu 'phrul rnam par 'phrul pa ji snyed cig ngas shes pa las khyed kyis ji tsam zhig shes te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:461b-14: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa ni 'dod na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:461b-15: sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed gang dag yod pa de dag thams cad zhing gcig tu yang dag par ston to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:461b-16: sangs rgyas kyi zhing gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed gang dag yod pa de dag gtsug phud kyis phug ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:461b-17: steng gi bar snang gi nam mkha' la 'jog go /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:462a-2: rgya mtsho chen por 'gyur ba'i chu'i phung po gang dag yod pa de dag thams cad spu'i khung bu gcig tu blugs kyang chu yis sems can rnams la gnod pa med de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:462a-3: thams cad kyang rang rang gi rgya mtsho chen po na gnas par bdag nyid kyis shes so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:462a-4: sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na ri'i rgyal po ri rab gang dag yod pa de dag thams cad ri gcig tu byin gyis brlabs te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:462a-5: ri de dag yungs kar gyi 'bru'i nang du bcug kyang ri rab la gnas pa'i lha de dag la yang gnod pa med de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:462a-6: thams cad kyang rang rang gi gnas na 'khod par bdag nyid kyis shes so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:462a-7: sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na 'gro ba lngar skyes pa'i sems can gang dag yod pa de dag thams cad lag pa g-yas pa'i mthil du bzhag ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:462a-8: 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba thams cad kyis rab tu brgyan pa'i sems can rnams kyi bde bar sbyar ba ci 'dra ba de lta bu dag de dag la bsgrub bo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:462a-9: gang yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed sreg par byed pa'i me de dag thams cad mar me'i snying po gcig gis me lce tsam gyi mer byin gyis rlob ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:462a-10: des bya ba byed pa gang yin pa de byed do /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:462a-11: sangs rgyas kyi zhing gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na nyi ma dang zla ba'i 'od gang dag yod pa de dag thams cad spu'i khung bu gcig gi 'od kyis zil du rlag par byed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:462b-0: 'jam @462b dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i rdzu 'phrul rnam par 'phrul pa'i cho 'phrul las brtsams nas nga bskal pa'am /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:462b-1: bskal pa las lhag par yang chos ston te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:462b-2: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:462b-3: rdzu 'phrul dang byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs bsam gyis mi khyab pa 'di lta bu dang ldan no ////
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:462b-4: bam po gnyis pa ste tha ma /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:462b-5: de nas bdud sdig can 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur nas 'dug ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:462b-6: des bdag nyid dge slong gi gzugs su byin gyis brlabs nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:462b-8: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i rdzu 'phrul rnam par 'phrul ba'i cho 'phrul de bdag gis blta bar bgyi'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:462b-10: tshig tsam du gsungs pas ci sman gyi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:462b-11: bdag la mngon sum du gyur cig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:462b-12: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bdud sdig can du mkhyen bzhin du sems can tshad med pa de dag gis dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par spel ba'i phyir /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:462b-13: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:462b-16: khyod kyis 'khor 'di dag la rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs dang cho 'phrul ston cig dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:462b-17: sems can tshad med pa rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:462b-18: de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bskul bar shes nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:463a-0: chos thams cad sems kyis dbang bsgyur ba rnam par 'phrul @463a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:463a-1: pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:463a-2: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas chos thams cad sems kyis dbang bsgyur ba rnam par 'phrul pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:463a-3: de nas de'i mod la thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor des 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i rdzu 'phrul rnam par 'phrul pa'i chos 'phrul bcom ldan 'das kyis ji skad gsungs pa de bzhin du ma chad pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:463a-6: de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyis cho 'phrul de mthong nas ngo mtshar du gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:463a-9: sangs rgyas byung ba ni sems can rnams la don chen por nye bar gnas so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:463a-10: de byung bas skyes bu dam pa 'di lta bu 'di dag kyang 'jig rten du byung ba yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:463a-11: cho 'phrul bsam gyis mi khyab pa 'di yang 'jig rten na snang ba yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:463a-12: zhes ched du brjod pa ched du brjod do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:463a-13: de nas bdud sdig can gyis cho 'phrul de mthong ste ngo mtshar du gyur nas thal mo sbyar te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:463a-14: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal zhing tshig 'di skad ces smras so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:463a-15: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul bsam gyis mi khyab ste ngo mtshar to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:463a-16: sems can gang dag cho 'phrul bshad pa 'di thos nas mos pa de dag ngo mtshar che bar bdag gis bsam so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:463b-1: gal te bdud sdig can gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed du gyur kyang de ltar mos pa'i sems can de la bar chad bgyi ba'i rngo mi thogs lags so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:463b-2: bcom ldan 'das bdud sdig can bdag ni rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par de bzhin gshegs pa la glags lta zhing skabs tshol ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:463b-3: sems can rnams la yang gtse bar sems pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:463b-4: brtson pa'i gang zag rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i bar chad bgyi ba'i slad du yang zhugs pa lags te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:463b-11: pho brang 'khor gang na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rab tu spyod pa de khor khor yug tu dpag tshad brgya tshun chad du mig gis mi rtsol bar bgyi ba'i slad du bdag cag mi mchi bar bdag gi yi dam de lta bu blangs par bgyi'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:463b-16: bsgrub pa de la ston pa la bgyi ba ltar gus pa bskyed par bgyi'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:463b-19: bdag gi 'khor gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa'i bar chad bgyi ba dang brtson pa rnams g-yengs par bgyi ba'i slad du zhugs pa dag mchis te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:463b-20: de dag chad pas dgum pa'i slad du rigs kyi bu'am /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:463b-21: rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag dran par bgyi'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:464a-0: aa ga la ma ni rdzi ta sha @464a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:464a-1: tru; dza ye dza ya ba ti bhu ta ma ti ma ti /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:464a-22: sa da dharma bh'a na ko sya /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:464a-23: s'u tra sya dh'a ra ka /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:464a-27: chos smra ba gang gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di rnams kyi kun du gsungs pa de la bdud kyi ris kyi lha'i bu rnams kyis bar chad bgyi ba ni gnas ma lags shing skabs ma lags te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:464a-28: de ni gnas ma mchis kyi steng du de la gos dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:464a-32: yo byad rnams nye bar bsgrub pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:464a-34: spobs par bgyi bar spro bar 'gyur lags so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:464a-36: rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang dag gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag brjod nas g-yeng ba ma mchis pa'i rgyud kyis gdugs mtshan 'das par bgyid pa de dag lha rnams kyis bsrungs par 'gyur /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:464a-44: mi dang mi lags pa rnams kyis bsrungs par 'gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:464a-45: de dag la slar rgol ba'am /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:464b-0: mi mdza' ba gang gis glags bltas kyang glags brnyed par mi 'gyur @464b lags so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:464b-1: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bdud sdig can la legs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:464b-6: 'di ltar khyod kyis gsang sngags kyi tshig bstan pa brjod pas 'jig rten gyi khams gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnam pa drug tu g-yos te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:464b-7: khyod kyi spobs pa de thams cad ni 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i byin gyis brlabs su rig par bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:464b-8: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i rdzu 'phrul rnam par 'phrul pa'i cho 'phrul dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:464b-9: byin gyi rlabs 'di bstan pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:464b-10: bdud kyi gsang sngags kyi stobs dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:464b-11: rig sngags kyi stobs bstan pa na srog chags nyi khris bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:464b-12: de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas rdzu 'phrul bsdus nas lha'i bu dpal bzang la 'di skad ces smras so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:464b-13: lha'i bu khyod dga' ldan gyi gnas su song la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:464b-14: dga' ldan gyi ris kyi lha'i bu rnams sdus shig dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:464b-16: de nas lha'i bu dpal bzang gis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i ltar mnyan te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:464b-18: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:464b-19: byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun thams cad dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:464b-20: nyan thos kyi dge 'dun gyi dge 'dun la bskor ba byas nas 'khor dang bcas pas 'khor de nas mi snang bar gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:464b-21: dga' ldan gyi gnas su phyin to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:465a-0: de nas lha'i bu dpal bzang gis @465a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:465a-1: dga' ldan gyi ris kyi lha'i bu rnams la smras pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:465a-4: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'u bu cag la snying brtse ba'i phyir 'dir 'ong gi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:465a-5: de la dga' ldan gyi ris kyi lha'i bu khyed dga' ba dang rtse ba la bag med par dor te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:465a-6: bag yod par gyis la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la chos nyan du shogs shig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:465a-7: de nas lha'i bu dpal bzang gis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir dga' ldan gyi gnas kyi dbus su lha'i yid las byung ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:465a-8: rin po che thams cad las byas pa'i 'khor gyi khyams chur shar nub tu dpag tshad sum khri nyis stong yod la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:465a-9: zheng lho byang du dpag tshad khri drug stong yod pa byas te /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:471a-6: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi bsgom pa gang zhe na /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:471b-12: brtson 'grus kyi stobs kyis bdud thams cad kyi thub par dka' ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:471b-13: dran pa'i stobs kyis nyan thos dang /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:471b-15: ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs kyis sgrib pa rnams kyis zil gyis mi gnon pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:471b-16: shes rab kyi stobs dang ldan pas lta bar gyur pa rnams kyis mngon par zhen pa med pa ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:471b-17: de ltar stobs lnga bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:471b-18: de byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:471b-19: byang chub kyi yan lag bsgom pa gang zhe na /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:472a-1: mthun par bya ba'i phyir chos rnam par 'byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag bsgom pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:472a-2: byang chub kyi lam las phyir mi ldog par bya ba'i phyir brtson 'grus yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag bsgom pa dang /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:472a-7: smon pa med pas mngon par bsgrubs pa'i ting nge 'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag bsgom pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:472a-8: mtho dma' med pa'i btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag bsgom pa ste /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:472b-17: gang nye bar ma bsgrubs pa des ma byas so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:472b-18: gang ma byas pa de myong ba med pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:472b-19: gang myong ba med pa de la gdags pa med do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:472b-20: gang gdags pa med pa de ni shin tu nye bar zhi ba'o //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:473b-0: byang chub sems dpa' sems nges par sems pa de dag rnams ni sems can chos thams cad stong pa'o snyam pa'i lta bar gyur @473b bar zhugs pa lta bar gyur pa bag la nyal bar byas pa rnams kyi lta bar gyur pa spang pa'i phyir chos kyang ston la /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:474b-1: 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan thams cad kyi 'od de phyogs gang na mchis /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:474b-6: 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan thams cad kyi 'od ces bya ba yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:474b-7: de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun tu bzang po zhes bya ba chos ston to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:474b-10: bdag gis 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan thams cad kyi 'od de dang /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:474b-12: de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas de'i tshe dri ma med pa'i 'od ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:474b-13: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu lus las de dang mthun pa'i 'od byung ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:474b-14: 'od des sangs rgyas kyi zhing gangg'a'i klung bcu gnyis kyi bye ma snyed po de dag snang bar byas nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:474b-15: 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan thams cad kyi 'od de yang snang ba chen pos khyab par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:474b-16: de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu bzang po de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du byang chub sems dpa' gang dag skyes pa de dag gis 'od de mthong nas ngo mtshar du gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:475a-3: 'od 'di ltar 'od yongs su dag pa 'di gang nas mchis /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:475a-4: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:475a-6: 'og gi phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing gangg'a'i klung bcu gnyis kyi bye ma snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:475a-7: de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sh'akya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:475a-11: de na phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa zhes bya ba dri ma med pa'i 'od ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:475a-12: de'i lus kyi 'od kyis phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad med grangs med pa dag snang ba chen pos khyab bo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:475a-13: des 'jig rten gyi khams 'di yang snang ba chen pos khyab bo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:475a-16: bdag cag gis 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed de dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:475a-17: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pa de dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:475a-18: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa blta bar bgyi'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:475a-19: de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu bzang pos zhabs kyi 'og gi mthil gyi 'khor lo rtsibs stong dang ldan pa las 'od zer stong phyung ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:475b-0: 'od zer de dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing gangg'a'i klung bcu gnyis kyi bye ma snyed las 'das @475b te; 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir snang ba chen pos khyab par byas so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:475b-1: de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di mthong zhing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:475b-2: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sh'akya thub pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:475b-3: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:475b-4: byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs thams cad kyang mthong ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:475b-5: byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag gis kyang 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan thams cad kyi 'od de mthong zhing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:475b-6: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun tu bzang po de dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:475b-7: byang chub sems dpa' de dag kyang mthong ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:475b-8: de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu bzang pos byang chub sems dpa' de dag la bka' stsal pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:475b-10: der chos kyi gtam chen po 'byung bar 'gyur na khyed kyi nang nas 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der 'gro bar spro ba su yod /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:475b-11: byang chub sems dpa' ye shes sgron ma 'dzin zhes bya ba der 'dus te 'dug par gyur pa des bcom ldan 'das de la gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:475b-13: bdag 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der mchi bar spro lags so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:475b-14: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:475b-16: da de'i dus la bab par shes na song zhig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:476a-0: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes sgron ma @476a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:476a-1: 'dzin byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag bcus yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te bcom ldan 'das de'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas bcom ldan 'das de la lan bdun bskor ba byas te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:476a-3: skyes bu stobs dang ldan pas lag pa bskum pa las brkyang ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:476a-4: brkyang pa las bskum pa tsam gyis skad cig thang cig yud tsam de la sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:476a-5: 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir dga' ldan gyi gnas su 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i mdun gyi steng gi bar snang la gnas pa'i khang pa brtsegs par phyin te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:476a-6: de'i g-yog 'khor de dag kyang khang pa brtsegs pa legs par ngas pa rnams su phyin to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:476a-7: de dag rang rang gi stan las langs nas thal mo sbyar te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:476a-8: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal zhing tshig 'di skad ces kyang smras so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:476a-10: bdag cag ni bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun tu bzang po des khyod la blta ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:476a-13: chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'dir btang ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:476a-14: khyod kyis 'od bkye ba de yang 'jig rten gyi khams der phyin to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:476a-15: de nas 'dod pa na spyod pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:476a-16: gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' de dag mthong nas ngo mtshar du gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:476b-0: kye @476b ma ji tsam du 'di ltar myur bar 'od zer 'di 'jig rten gyi khams der phyin pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:476b-1: 'di ltar myur bar byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir phyin pa 'di ni skyes bu dam pa de dag gis mngon par shes pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa'i stobs dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:476b-2: ting nge 'dzin gyi byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs bsam gyis mi khyab bo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:476b-3: zhes ched du brjod pa ched du brjod do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:476b-4: de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas lha'i 'khor chen po 'dus pa de la ci nas kyang lha khrag khrig phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis bsam pa thag pa nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa de lta de ltar chos ston to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:476b-5: de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa ji srid du dga' ldan gyi gnas su lha rnams kyi don bya ba de srid du byas nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:476b-6: byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag bcu po de dag dang lhan cig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:476b-10: 'jig rten skyong ba'i lha'i bu dang bcas pa dang lhan cig tu dga' ldan gyi gnas nas mi snang bar gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:476b-11: sems kyi 'gyur ba tsam gyis bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar phyin nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:476b-12: de dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te; bcom ldan 'das la lan bdun bskor ba byas nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:476b-14: phyogs gcig tu rang rang gi stan la 'khod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:477a-0: de nas byang chub sems dpa' ye shes @477a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:477a-1: sgron ma 'dzin dang lhan cig lhags pa'i byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag bcu po de dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:477a-2: lan bdun bskor ba byas nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:477a-3: bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar thal mo sbyar te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:477a-4: bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:477a-6: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu bzang pos gnod pa chung ngam /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:477a-9: stobs dang bde ba la reg par gnas sam /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:477a-11: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:477a-12: thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de chos kyi gtam gyis yang dag par dga' bar mdzad /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:477a-15: yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:477a-16: yang dag par dga' bar mdzad cing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:477a-17: yang dag par 'dzin du bcug la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:477a-18: yang dag par gzengs bstod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:477a-19: yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas kyang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:477a-20: thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de la bka' stsal pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:477a-22: skyes bu dam pa 'di dag dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:477a-23: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:477a-24: byang chub sems dpa' ye shes sgron ma 'dzin gyi mngon par shes pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:477a-25: byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:477b-0: yongs su smin par byed @477b pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:477b-3: shes rab kyi rab tu dbye ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:477b-6: byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag ni bskal pa grangs med pa nas bzung ste; sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pas sems can rnams la nye bar gnas pa dag go /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:477b-7: sems can gang dag gi dbang po drug po dag la skyes bu dam pa 'di dag mngon par gyur pa de dag ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:477b-8: phyis bdud kyi yul la gnas par mi 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:477b-10: de nas byang chub sems dpa' gang dag byang chub sems dpa' ye shes sgron ma 'dzin dang lhan cig tu 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir phyin pa de dag /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:477b-11: bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pa las chos thos nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:477b-12: mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:477b-13: de nas byang chub sems dpa' ye shes sgron ma 'dzin dang lhan cig lhags pa'i byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag bcu po de dag gis /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:477b-14: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:477b-15: lan bdun bskor ba byas nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:477b-16: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rab tu g-yos par byas te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:477b-17: bcom ldan 'das kyi drung nas mi snang bar gyur nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:477b-18: skad cig thang cig yud tsam de la 'jig rten gyi khams der phyin to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:477b-19: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:477b-20: kun dga' bo khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gzung zhig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:478a-2: gzhan dag la yang rgya cher rab tu ston cig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:478a-5: bdag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni bzung lags na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:478a-6: 'di'i ming ji skad gzung bar bgyi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:478a-7: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:478a-9: de bas na khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'jam dpal gyi le'u dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:478a-10: sangs rgyas kyi yul bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan pa zhes bya bar gzung zhig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:478a-11: bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas lha'i bu dpal bzang dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:478a-12: tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:478a-13: thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:478a-17: dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:478a-18: bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:478a-19: 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:478a-20: sangs rgyas kyi yul bsam gyis mi khyab pa lha'i bu dpal bzang gis zhus pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:478a-21: 'dus pa sum cu rtsa lnga pa rdzogs so ////
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:478a-22: rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-017:478a-25: zhu chen gyi lo tstsha ba zhang ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa ////
